note.p: Career: MP for New Romney (1689); MP for Dover, (1690, 1695-death); Member of the Committee for the Relief of Huguenot Refugees; Commissioner for Assessment for Kent and New Romney (1689-1690), and for Middlesex (1690); Assistant to the Mines Company (1693); Deputy-Lieutenant of Kent (1694-death); Commissioner for Customs (1694-death); lived with Tillotson after the death of his wife
Notes: This identification remains tentative, but likely
